title: Victoria - A Mystery at Bancroft Hall.
description: Coming 2016!!Its 1880. The sun has risen through the dismal gloom hanging over the Thames. Smoke wisps’ cling to the chimney stacks as the morning fires are lit throughout the frosty town. Inspector Tiberius Malloy has two things on his mind – The Queensbury Murders and how to keep one Lady Victoria Bancroft from trying to solve them and out of trouble. But Victoria has her own ideas. Despite warnings the Lady of the manner is determined to solve this mystery before anyone else gets hurt. Brave and determined, Victoria - A Mystery at Bancroft Hall gives you a Sherlock Holmes read with a vivacious feminine touch full of intrigue suspense and a tiny hint of romance!
author: M.W. Russell
